items.hed: Bundle Up in This Season’s Coolest (and Coziest) Coats
items.dek: This fall, opt for outerwear that makes a statement.

fields.caption:
**Ask the Editors**

 Want to get in touch with a specific member of the Teen Vogue team? [Email us!](http://www.teenvogue.com/contact/tellus)



**Modeling Policy**

 Teen Vogue works with established modeling agencies to cast talent in our editorials. We do NOT recruit models via TeenVogue.com, Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, email, or anywhere online. Please see our [model policy](http://www.teenvogue.com/magazine/2011/model-policy) and [send us an email](http://www.teenvogue.com/contact/tellus) if you’ve been contacted by a representative claiming they are from Teen Vogue.



**Subscription Questions**

 If you have questions about your subscription, check out our [customer care](https://w1.buysub.com/pubs/N3/TNV/login_3_methods.jsp?cds_page_id=10531&cds_mag_code=TNV&id=1344392260198&lsid=22202117150023600&vid=2) page or e-mail [TNVcustserv@cdsfulfillment.com](mailto:TNVcustserv@cdsfulfillment.com).



**Email the Webmaster**

 Having a technical problem with the site? Link down? [Let us know about it](http://www.teenvogue.com/contact/contact_tnv)! If you’re wondering about advertising or anything else, [send in a V-Mail](http://www.teenvogue.com/contact/tellus).



**Press Inquiries**

 Contact our Senior Public Relations Director [Erin Kaplan](mailto:Erin_Kaplan@condenast.com).



**Sweepstakes Inquiries**

 Interested in learning more about our Win It section? [Email us](mailto:sweepstakes@teenvogue.com)!

items.hed: Bundle Up in This Season’s Coolest (and Coziest) Coats
items.dek: This fall, opt for outerwear that makes a statement.
items.body:
+++large

__Hair:__ Tamara McNaughton for Wella

+++


  
  


+++large

__Makeup:__ Emi Kaneko using Nars

+++


   
 


+++large

__Nails:__ Yuko Tsuchihashi for Susan Price NYC

+++

items.title: __Coat Tales__
items.caption: Elizabeth wears a Sacai coat. Opening Ceremony shirt, $115. Jill Stuart turtleneck. Christopher Kane skirt. Maria La Rosa socks (worn throughout), $55. Paco Rabanne shoes (worn throughout).

items.title: __Hot Fuzz__
items.caption: Elizabeth wears a Sacai coat. Opening Ceremony shirt, $115. Jill Stuart turtleneck. Christopher Kane skirt. Maria La Rosa socks (worn throughout), $55. Paco Rabanne shoes (worn throughout).

items.title: __Yin and Yang__
items.caption: Coach coat. McQ sweater. Tommy Hilfiger sweater (worn underneath), $120. Gucci dress.

items.title: __Rain or Shine__
items.caption: J. Crew faux-fur-accented coat, $365. Golden Goose Deluxe Brand sweatshirt. 7 For All Mankind jeans, $235.

items.title: __Parka Avenue__
items.caption: Michael Michael Kors coat, $395. 3.1 Phillip Lim vest. Paco Rabanne sweatshirt and skirt. Sandro top, $190. T by Alexander Wang turtleneck, $380.

items.title: __Brocade Dreams__
items.caption: Mary Katrantzou coat. Babaton for Aritzia turtleneck, $95. Re/Done jeans, $264.

items.socialTitle: Bundle Up in This Season’s Coolest (and Coziest) Coats
items.socialDescription: This fall, opt for outerwear that makes a statement.
items.seoDescription: Check out this stunning editorial from our October 2015 issue featuring this season's coziest outerwear.
